articles.author: Adam B. Vary
articles.title: ‘House of the Dragon’ Renewed for Season 3 - Variety
articles.description: HBO has renewed its 'Game of Thrones' spin-off series 'House of the Dragon' for Season 3, in advance of its Season 2 premiere.
articles.content:
Demonstrating the formidable strength of HBO’s “Game of Thrones” empire, the network has renewed “House of the Dragon” for Season 3, in advance of its Season 2 premiere on June 16.
